Rurouni Kenshin: The Beginning

2021 | 2h 18m | Action

Before he was a protector, Kenshin was a fearsome assassin known as Battosai. But when he meets the gentle Tomoe Yukishiro, his story begins to change.

Starring: Takeru Satoh,Kasumi Arimura,Issey Takahashi

Enishi, musuh paling menakutkan dalam serial "Rurouni Kenshin", melancarkan serangan besar-besaran terhadap Tokyo demi membalaskan dendam kepada Kenshin.
